nodes.text: Kiren was a mechanic who worked in Cloud City on Bespin alongside their coworker, Baudu. The non-binary being had fur and a snout, and understood but did not speak Galactic Basic Standard; still, they communicated with Baudu and their friend Tal Veridian with gestures and vocalizations, such as grunts and growls. The trio were opposed to the Galactic Empire. Kiren could fly a U-33 orbital loadlifter.
